A

applications - package applications
 
Assignment3 - Class in applications
Purpose is to test class Employee ...
Assignment3() - Constructor for class applications.Assignment3
 

B

business - package business
 

C

calculatePension() - Method in class business.Employee
This method: Calculates the pension for the current period as 6% of the grossPayThisPeriod. Subtract the calculated amount from both the taxThisPay and taxYTD instance variables.
calculateSalary() - Method in class business.Employee
This method will only be called for objects for salaried employees with payType “S4”).
calculateTax() - Method in class business.Employee
This method: Calculates the tax for the current period as 10% of the grossPayThisPeriod. Subtracts the calculated amount from both the taxThisPay and taxYTD instance variables.
calculateUnion() - Method in class business.Employee
This method: Calculate the union dues for current pay period as a fixed rate $2,00. Subtract the calculated amount from both the netThisPay and netYTD instance variables[.]
calculateWages(double) - Method in class business.Employee
This method will only be called for objects for hourly paid employees with payType “HW”) Calculates the gross pay for the current pay period for hourly rate employees (payType “HW” ) by multiplying the value of the salary variable by the value of hoursWorked (parameter 1). Adds the calculated amount to both the grossThisPay and grossYTD instance variables.

D

dri - Variable in class applications.Assignment3
 

E

Employee - Class in business
Class Employee represents a real-world Employee.
Employee() - Constructor for class business.Employee
The application has only one constructor.
employeeId - Variable in class business.Employee
 

F

formatDisplay(StringBuffer) - Method in class business.Employee
In Order to test a class properly it is essential to be able to display the status of objects (ALL the data within the object).
formatHeadings(StringBuffer) - Static method in class applications.Assignment3
This method creates headings for the report with the current date.
formatPaySlip(StringBuffer) - Method in class business.Employee
Appends the data from one object, formatted as a payslip, to the StringBuffer (parameter 1).

G

getData(StringBuffer, DataReaderImpl_1, String) - Static method in class business.Employee
This method supplies a CSV with data to udate() the business object.
getPrimaryKey() - Method in class business.Employee
Supplies a primary key value for possible use with Hashtable or relational database storage applications.
